data.actual_result: A horizonal scroll bar appears for the duration of the typing indicator.
data.expected_result: either the name gets cut off or continues on another line.
data.short_description: Excessively long usernames will break the typing indicator
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your nickname or someone elses nickname to something excessively long (make sure there are no spaces).  - NOTE: The only character I've found that's worked is ﷽, and yes, that is just one character (imagine how long 32 of them are) - Observe the horizional scroll line that appears below the typing indicator.
